text: Mrs. A is literally a lifesaver. My daughter begs to go to her house. It's not just childcare, it's a whole vibe.
Finally, someone who gets it. No judgment, just pure love and fun. The updates she sends are hilarious and so reassuring.
The creative activities are next level. My son comes home with the coolest art projects (that are actually fridge-worthy).
Flexible, reliable, and honestly just the coolest person. I trust her completely with my twins.
I was so nervous leaving my baby, but Mrs. A made the transition so easy. She's basically family now.
